entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 11.
